verses.verse: Then came <WH7126> the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765>, the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, the son <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, of the families <WH4940> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>: and these are the names <WH8034> of his daughters <WH1323>; Mahlah <WH4244>, Noah <WH5270>, and Hoglah <WH2295>, and Milcah <WH4435>, and Tirzah <WH8656>.

And they stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872>, and before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> the princes <WH5387> and all the congregation <WH5712>, by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, saying <WH559>,

Our father <WH1> died <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and he was not in <WH8432> the company <WH5712> of them that gathered themselves together <WH3259> against the Lord <WH3068> in the company <WH5712> of Korah <WH7141>; but died <WH4191> in his own sin <WH2399>, and had no sons <WH1121>.

Why should the name <WH8034> of our father <WH1> be done away <WH1639> from among <WH8432> his family <WH4940>, because he has no son <WH1121>? Give <WH5414> unto us therefore a possession <WH272> among <WH8432> the brothers <WH251> of our father <WH1>.
And Moses <WH4872> brought <WH7126> their cause <WH4941> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

The daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765> speak <WH1696> right <WH3651>: you shall surely <WH5414> give <WH5414> them a possession <WH272> of an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> their father <WH1>'s brothers <WH251>; and you shall cause the inheritance <WH5159> of their father <WH1> to pass unto them <WH5674>.

And you shall speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, If a man <WH376> die <WH4191>, and have no son <WH1121>, then you shall cause his inheritance <WH5159> to pass <WH5674> unto his daughter <WH1323>.
And if he have no daughter <WH1323>, then you shall give <WH5414> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his brothers <WH251>.
And if he have no brothers <WH251>, then you shall give <WH5414> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his father <WH1>'s brothers <WH251>.

And if his father <WH1> have no brothers <WH251>, then you shall give <WH5414> his inheritance <WH5159> unto his kinsman <WH7607> that is next <WH7138> to him of his family <WH4940>, and he shall possess <WH3423> it <WH1121>: and it shall be unto the sons of Israel <WH3478> a statute <WH2708> of judgment <WH4941>, as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Get you up <WH5927> into this mountain <WH2022> Abarim <WH5682>, and see <WH7200> the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And when you have seen <WH7200> it <WH622>, you also shall be gathered unto your people <WH5971>, as Aaron <WH175> your brother <WH251> was gathered <WH622>.

For you rebelled <WH4784> against my commandment <WH6310> in the desert <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>, in the strife <WH4808> of the congregation <WH5712>, to sanctify <WH6942> me at the water <WH4325> before their eyes <WH5869>: that is the water <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809> in Kadesh <WH6946> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>.
And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> unto the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,
Let the Lord <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all flesh <WH1320>, set <WH6485> a man <WH376> over the congregation <WH5712>,

Which may go out <WH3318> before <WH6440> them <WH935>, and which may go in before <WH6440> them <WH3318>, and which may lead them out, and which may bring them in <WH935>; that the congregation <WH5712> of the Lord <WH3068> be not as sheep <WH6629> which have no shepherd <WH7462>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Take <WH3947> you Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, a man <WH376> in whom is the spirit <WH7307>, and lay <WH5564> your hand upon him <WH3027>;
And set <WH5975> him before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> all the congregation <WH5712>; and give him a charge <WH6680> in their sight <WH5869>.
And you shall put <WH5414> some of your honor <WH1935> upon him <WH5712>, that all the congregation of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may be obedient <WH8085>.

And he shall stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, who shall ask <WH7592> counsel for him after the judgment <WH4941> of Urim <WH224> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>: at his word <WH6310> shall they go out <WH3318>, and at his word <WH6310> they shall come in <WH935>, both he <WH1121>, and all the sons of Israel <WH3478> with him <WH5712>, even all the congregation.

And Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> him <WH3947>: and he took Joshua <WH3091>, and set <WH5975> him before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> all the congregation <WH5712>:
And he laid <WH5564> his hands <WH3027> upon him <WH6680>, and gave him a charge, as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH1696> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.
